companyName: Blackrock New York Municipal Bond Trust of Beneficial Interest
description: To provide high current income exempt from regular Federal, New York State and New York City income taxes. It will invest 80% of the assets in municipal bonds of investment grade quality (Baa or BBB or better) or determined to be of equivalent quality by the investment advisor. 20% of the assets may be invested in municipal bonds rated Ba/BB or B or judged to be of comparable quality.
